AssociateCustomDomain.name: AssociateCustomDomain
AssociateCustomDomain.description:
Grants permission to associate your own domain name with the AWS App Runner subdomain
                                                URL of your App Runner service

CreateAutoScalingConfiguration.name: CreateAutoScalingConfiguration
CreateAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration resource

CreateConnection.name: CreateConnection
CreateConnection.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner connection resource

CreateService.name: CreateService
CreateService.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner service

DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration.name: DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration
DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration resource

DeleteConnection.name: DeleteConnection
DeleteConnection.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner connection

DeleteService.name: DeleteService
DeleteService.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner service

DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration.name: DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration
DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptions of an AWS App Runner automatic scaling
                                                configuration resource

DescribeCustomDomains.name: DescribeCustomDomains
DescribeCustomDomains.description:
Grants permission to retrieve descriptions of custom domain names associated with
                                                an AWS App Runner service

DescribeOperation.name: DescribeOperation
DescribeOperation.description:
Grants permission to retrieve description of an operation that occurred on an AWS
                                                App Runner service

DescribeService.name: DescribeService
DescribeService.description: Grants permission to retrieve description of an AWS App Runner service

DisassociateCustomDomain.name: DisassociateCustomDomain
DisassociateCustomDomain.description: Grants permission to disassociate a custom domain name from an AWS App Runner service

ListAutoScalingConfigurations.name: ListAutoScalingConfigurations
ListAutoScalingConfigurations.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner automatic scaling configurations
                                                in your AWS account

ListConnections.name: ListConnections
ListConnections.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner connections associated with
                                                your AWS account

ListOperations.name: ListOperations
ListOperations.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of operations that occurred on an AWS App Runner
                                                service

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of running AWS App Runner services in your AWS
                                                account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags associated with an AWS App Runner resource

PauseService.name: PauseService
PauseService.description: Grants permission to pause an active AWS App Runner service

ResumeService.name: ResumeService
ResumeService.description: Grants permission to resume an active AWS App Runner service

StartDeployment.name: StartDeployment
StartDeployment.description: Grants permission to initiate a manual deployemnt to an AWS App Runner service

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to, or update tag values of, an App Runner resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an App Runner resource

UpdateService.name: UpdateService
UpdateService.description: Grants permission to update an AWS App Runner service
